CustomField.formula: CASE(StageName, "Target Account",(IF(Stage_Duration__c<81,NULL,Stage_Duration__c-80)), "Expression of Interest",(IF(Stage_Duration__c<96,NULL,Stage_Duration__c-90)), "Investigation",(IF(Stage_Duration__c<75,NULL,Stage_Duration__c-74)), "Business Case Development",(IF(Stage_Duration__c<105,NULL,Stage_Duration__c-104)), "Evaluation of Options",(IF(Stage_Duration__c<81,NULL,Stage_Duration__c-80)), "Resolution of Concerns",(IF(Stage_Duration__c<71,NULL,Stage_Duration__c-70)), "Get Management Approval",(IF(Stage_Duration__c<45,NULL,Stage_Duration__c-44)), "Obtain Contract",(IF(Stage_Duration__c<10,NULL,Stage_Duration__c-9)), NULL )
CustomField.label: Stage Duration: Days Exceeding Average
